TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RecognizedPhrase extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含由语音识别器生成的有关识别的输入的详细信息。

span.span: Contains detailed information, generated by the speech recognizer, about the recognized input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Confidence As Single
public: property float Confidence { float get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取识别器分配的值，此值表示 与给定输入匹配的可能性。

span.span: Gets a value, assigned by the recognizer, that represents the likelihood that a matches a given input.

value.span: 对正确识别语法的确定性的相对度量。

span.span: A relative measure of the certainty of correct recognition of a phrase.

value.span: 该值分别为从 0.0 到 1.0，从低到高置信。

span.span: The value is from 0.0 to 1.0, for low to high confidence, respectively.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable ConstructSmlFromSemantics() cil managed

summary.span: 为 对象中的语义信息返回语义标记语言 (SML) 文档。

span.span: Returns a semantic markup language (SML) document for the semantic information in the object.

returns.span: 以 XPath 可导航对象的形式返回 的语义的 SML 描述。

span.span: Returns an SML description of the semantics of the as an XPath navigable object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Grammar As Grammar
public: property System::Speech::Recognition::Grammar ^ Grammar { System::Speech::Recognition::Grammar ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取语音识别器用于返回 的 。

span.span: Gets the that the speech recognizer used to return the .

value.span: 语音识别器用于标识输入的语法对象。

span.span: The grammar object that the speech recognizer used to identify the input.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property HomophoneGroupId As Integer
public: property int HomophoneGroupId { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取短语同音字组的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier for the homophone group for the phrase.

value.span: 短语同音字组的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the homophone group for the phrase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语音识别器将组标识符分配给具有相同发音的所有识别备用项。The speech recognizer assigns a group identifier to all recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation. 对于每个具有唯一发音的备用, 识别器会创建一个短语同音字组。For each alternate that has a unique pronunciation, the recognizer creates a homophone group. 语音识别器为每个识别操作生成新的标识符组, 而不能使用标识符来比较从单独的识别操作生成的替代项。The speech recognizer generates new group of identifiers for each recognition operation, and the identifiers cannot be used to compare alternates from generated from separate recognition operations. 例如, 对于包含替代 "the tale"、"tail" 和 "短语同音字" 的识别结果, 前两个备用项属于一个组, 最后一个备用项是第二个短语同音字组的单个成员。For example, for a recognition result that contained the alternates "the tale", "the tail", and "the ale", the first two alternates would belong to one homophone group, and the last alternate would be the single member of a second homophone group.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Homophones As ReadOnlyCollection(Of RecognizedPhrase)

summary.span: 获取识别备用项的集合，这些备用项具有与此识别语法一样的发音。

span.span: Gets a collection of the recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase.

value.span: 只读识别备用项的集合，这些备用项具有与此识别语法一样的发音。

span.span: A read-only collection of the recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回与此识别的短语具有相同发音的所有其他识别备用项。This property returns all other recognition alternates that have the same pronunciation as this recognized phrase. 例如, 对于包含备用项 "tale" 和 "homophones" 的识别结果, 第一个替换项的集合 "the tale" 将包含第二个短语 "the tail"。For example, for a recognition result that contained the alternates, "the tale" and "the tail", the homophones collection for the first alternate, "the tale", would contain the second phrase, "the tail". 第二个替代方法 "the tail" 的 homophones 集合将包含第一个短语 "the tale"。The homophones collection for the second alternate, "the tail", would contain the first phrase, "the tale".

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReplacementWordUnits As Collection(Of ReplacementText)

summary.span: 获取语音识别器作为语音到文本规范化一部分更改的文本的相关信息。

span.span: Gets information about the text that the speech recognizer changed as part of speech-to-text normalization.

value.span: 对象的集合，这些对象描述在语音识别器规范化已识别输入时所替换的文本部分。

span.span: A collection of objects that describe sections of text that the speech recognizer replaced when it normalized the recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为语音识别过程的一部分, 语音识别器将识别的输入规范化为显示形式。As part of the speech recognition process, the speech recognizer normalizes the recognized input into a display form. 例如, 口述输入 "20 5 美元" 会生成一个识别结果, 其中属性包含单词 "20"、"5" 和 "美元", 属性包含 "$25.00" 这一短语。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 有关文本规范化的详细信息, 请参阅类。For more information about text normalization, see the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Semantics As SemanticValue

summary.span: 获取与所识别的短语相关的语义信息。

span.span: Gets the semantic information that is associated with the recognized phrase.

value.span: 与所识别的短语相关的语义信息。

span.span: The semantic information associated with the recognized phrase.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Text As String
public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取语音识别器从识别的输入生成的规范化文本。

span.span: Gets the normalized text generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

value.span: 语音识别器从识别的输入生成的规范化文本。

span.span: The normalized text generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为语音识别过程的一部分, 语音识别器将识别出的输入的语音转换到文本规范化。As part of the speech recognition process, the speech recognizer performs speech-to-text normalization of the recognized input into a display form. 例如, 口述输入 "20 5 美元" 会生成一个识别结果, 其中属性包含单词 "20"、"5" 和 "美元", 属性包含 "$25.00" 这一短语。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 有关文本规范化的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about text normalization, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Words As ReadOnlyCollection(Of RecognizedWordUnit)

summary.span: 获取语音识别器从识别的输入生成的词语。

span.span: Gets the words generated by a speech recognizer from recognized input.

value.span: 语音识别器针对识别的输入生成的 对象的集合。

span.span: The collection of objects generated by a speech recognizer for recognized input.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含在识别器的结果的语音到文本规范化之前, 由语音识别器输入生成的单词。This property contains the words produced from the input by the speech recognizer prior to the recognizer's speech-to-text normalization of the result. 例如, 口述输入 "20 5 美元" 会生成一个识别结果, 其中属性包含单词 "20"、"5" 和 "美元", 属性包含 "$25.00" 这一短语。For example, the spoken input, "twenty five dollars", generates a recognition result where the property contains the words, "twenty", "five", and "dollars", and the property contains the phrase, "$25.00". 有关文本规范化的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about text normalization, see .
